title: tIrum tollai tarum
sahitya:
tIrum tollai tarum tIvinaigaL ellAm Arumukhan sIraDi sEruvOrkku


anupallavi

  ArupaDai vIDutanil sIruDan kuDikoNDa kAruNya svarUpan pEraruL nADuvOrkku


caraNam    pAr idaniltanniru pAdam paNivOr paDum tollai yAvaiyum aDiyODu tIra avar
kOrum uru tuNaiyai koDuttu aNaivadil vEru nigharillA vElan pEraruLAl
